{"id":730517781,"lang":"python3","time":"1 week, 4 days","timestamp":1656123852,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"327 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/730517781/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Non-decreasing Array","memory":"15.3 MB","code":"class Solution:\n    def checkPossibility(self, nums: List[int]) -> bool:\n        inf = 1e5 + 1\n        nums.insert(0, -inf)\n        nums.append(inf)\n        n = len(nums)\n        pos = []\n        for i in range(n - 1):\n            if nums[i] > nums[i + 1]:\n                pos.append(i)\n        if len(pos) > 1:\n            return False\n        if len(pos) == 0:\n            return True\n        x = pos[0]\n        if (nums[x - 1] <= nums[x] <= nums[x + 2]) or (nums[x - 1] <= nums[x + 1] <= nums[x + 2]):\n            return True\n        return False\n        ","compare_result":"","title_slug":"non-decreasing-array"}
